entry.title: New release for Beszel Companion: Release v1.2.0
entry.content:
New Features

Multi-Instance Management

Beszel Companion now fully supports managing multiple server instances.

  • Effortless Switching: Easily connect to and monitor different Beszel servers.
  • Dedicated Pinned Charts: Each instance now retains its own unique set of pinned charts on the dashboard.
  • Seamless Instance Selector: A new, intuitive instance selector has been integrated into the navigation bar, providing quick access to all your configured servers.

Home Screen Widgets Enhancements

  • Instance Selection: You can now choose which of your configured Beszel instances a widget should display data for directly from the widget configuration. You can now monitor different servers right from your Home Screen
  • Synced with App Settings: Widgets automatically respect the time range and language selected in the app's settings. Change a setting in the app, and the widget updates instantly.

Fixes & Improvements

Localization & UI Stability

  • Improved Localization: All translation issues have been addressed, ensuring a consistent and accurate experience across all supported languages.
  • Translation Keys: We've refactored our localization system to use more robust and maintainable translation keys, paving the way for easier future language support.
  • Instant Language Switching: Changing the language in the settings now instantly and reliably updates the entire application UI, including all titles, labels, and chart text.
  • Widget Localization: Widgets now correctly display all text in the language selected within the app.
  • Enhanced Navigation Bar Behavior: The navigation bar's overall behavior have been improved for a smoother user experience.

entry.title: New release for Beszel Companion: App Store - Initial release
entry.content:
v1.2.2 - Now available on the App Store!

I'm thrilled to announce that Beszel Companion is now officially available on the iOS App Store!

You can download it directly from your iPhone:

A note on this release

Please note that the App Store does not accept submissions built with beta versions of Xcode. As a result, this initial release was built using the latest stable tools.

Consequently, the app's UI does not yet incorporate Apple's new "Liquid Glass" design system, which was introduced with the latest OS betas. A design refresh to adopt this new look is planned for a future release, once the development tools are officially available.

What's in this release?

This initial version includes all the core features to monitor your Beszel instance from your phone: - Custom Dashboard for quick access to your favorite charts. - System & Container Stats (CPU, memory, etc.). - Interactive Charts with time range filtering. - Secure Connection using the iOS Keychain. - Home Screen Widgets. - Multiple Beszel instances support. - A fully native SwiftUI experience with Dark Mode support.

Sideloading

For those who prefer to sideload, the .ipa file is attached below in the Assets section.

Please feel free to open an issue for any feedback or bug reports.

entry.title: New release for Beszel Companion: Release v1.3.0
entry.content:
New Features

Multi-Systems Management

You can now effortlessly manage and monitor different systems within a single system.

  • Streamlined System Management: Gain better control over various systems operating within one hub.
  • Improved Overview: Easily monitor the performance and status of individual systems at a glance.

Home Screen Widgets Enhancements

  • Hub Selection: You can now choose which of your configured Hubs & Systems a widget should display data for directly from the widget configuration.

Fixes & Improvements

Terminology Update

  • "Instance" is now "Hub": To provide a clearer and more intuitive experience, the term "Instance" has been updated to "Hub" throughout the application.

Build Improvements

  • Two IPA files are now provided: one built with the latest SDK 26 for iOS 26 beta users (including new Liquid Glass design), and another built with SDK 18.5 for broader compatibility.

This version has already been updated on the App Store. You can download it directly from your iPhone:
